Review_Text: Fascinating insight into what makes a great sportsman tickMust admit though a fan of his riding before viewing this film was not his greatest supporter as a man as always looked to be playing up to the camerasBut after watching this think I have changed my mind!

What an insight into a fascinating and complex upbringing for anyone to see how to deal with life's tough lessons within a turbulent early family situation.Intriguingly thoughtful and honest contributions from the great man himself to all those who participated.This documentary has given us an opportunity to admire the career and the person even more.
